about_the_game:
The Lost Adventure - is a captivating 2D game that immerses players in a straightforward quest. As the main protagonist, your objective is to escape from a dungeon and recover your lost memories. Assume the role of a daring adventurer and explore treacherous zones, engaging in battles with cunning goblins, bloodthirsty slimes, and avoiding being devoured by a colossal worm, among other mortal perils. Your mission is to rescue the main hero and restore their memories.

Key Features:
  • Responsive controls
  • Epic music
  • Varied enemies
  • Responsive controls
  • Challenging boss battles
  • Unveiling mysteries

In The Lost Adventure, you'll experience smooth and intuitive controls, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the game world. Engage in thrilling battles against a range of enemies and confront powerful bosses that will test your skills. Prepare to unravel the secrets hidden within the dungeon as you piece together the fragmented memories of the main hero. With atmospheric environments, captivating visuals, and an immersive soundtrack, The Lost Adventure delivers an unforgettable gaming experience.

Embark on this perilous journey, overcome the challenges that lie ahead, and emerge victorious. Can you escape the dungeon and restore the protagonist's lost memories? The fate of the main hero rests in your hands.

name: The lost adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Сore i3-560
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Quadro 410 512 Mb (VCQ410-PB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Сore i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Lost Adventure - is a straightforward 2D game in which the main hero must escape from a dungeon and recover lost memories. You will encounter battles against bloodthirsty slimes, cunning goblins, and numerous other dangers that await you.
